page.title: 06LOCAL HISTORY 2
page.content: Coal dealer,poulterer,post-office,tax collector,miller,draper,chemist,boat builder,7 public houses,1 beer retailer.Beer and coal delivered by barge.Population in 1871 was 1,699. {Millbrook Parish Church.}is a large church,completed 1 November 1895, replacing an earlier church near the present cemetery.Services held 0800, 1030,Evensong 1800hrs.Baptist Chapel in West St. demolished 1969. Methodist Chapel completed September 1873. Sunday Schools at church and chapel. {St.Johns Church.}is a small church, built 12th. Century.It has 3 bells - Treble bell cast in reign of Henry VIII.Middle bell cast 1682,Tenor bell cast in 1746.Services now held every second Sunday.
